title: Beautiful unit located only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square
description: Location Location Location! Available 09/1/2023. 20th & Walnut - only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square, bars, restaurants, shops, historic places & more! This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. In recent decades, Eberhardt's Antiques operated out of the first floor. Now it is your chance to rent this amazing studio in the heart of Rittenhouse Square! When you walk into the building, you will be amazed by the preserved historic details and gorgeous mirrors throughout the hallway. The building has a big shared rooftop with sublime views of the city! The apartment is located on the 5th floor accessible by elevator. The details of the building will make everyday walking in that hallway feel like a special occasion! The studio can fit a full/queen-sized bed, a small table, a nightstand, a TV, and a dresser. It has a spacious closet with an organizer. This apartment is a part of an add-on structure to 2010 Walnut so it is actually not even 3 years old! It has stainless steel appliances, a remote-controlled wall unit for heating and cooling, a beautiful bathroom, and an in-unit washer & dryer! Water is included in the rent. Pets are ok with a pet deposit and under 50 pounds. Inquire about the video tour! First, and last & security to move in. 700+ credit score & 3x the rent income required to move in. No Airbnb arbitrage. Inquire about other units that we have available in this beautiful building!

title: Spacious & Bright 3 bed 2 bath & Granite Countertops with Laundry Room
description: Welcome to 2016 Bethel Road, a charming ranch home situated on 1.5 acres in Worcester Township. Conveniently located near commuter routes and all the restaurants and shopping that nearby Blue Bell has to offer. The home sits back from the road with ample parking. There is an attached 1-car garage, but you could fit a couple more cars in the driveway’s bumpout. Step inside to what feels like a breath of fresh air. Light grey walls, large windows, and white crown molding make the main living area feel bright and cheery. Hardwoods flow throughout the living and dining area, and the wood stove fireplace adds a cozy touch. The dining room overlooks the large backyard and the kitchen. The kitchen has plenty of storage, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and recessed lighting. Two bedrooms are currently being repurposed as an office and additional living space. The primary bedroom is around the corner from the full bathroom with tub shower and subway tile walls. Another half bathroom and a full, walkout unfinished basement for storage complete the interior. Head out the back door by the kitchen to the large patio, which has plenty of room for tables and chairs and grilling. The spacious backyard is fully fenced in and backs up against a wooded area. Email your number to set up a showing!

title: Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
1616 Walnut St #1B-1011

title: 1917 Spruce St, Philadelphia, PA 19103 FOR RENT
description:
This lovely, light filled two bedroom condo in a boutique building is mere steps from Rittenhouse Square and features soaring ceilings, an upgraded kitchen, and custom designed finishes throughout. It can also be rented furnished to make it 100% move-in ready. From the buildings shared vestibule, enter into the open floorplan main level, with two oversized south facing windows, gorgeous hardwood floors, crown moldings and the spacious kitchen. The kitchen features shaker-style wood cabinets with tons of storage, granite countertops, travertine tile backsplash and stainless-steel Frigidaire appliances including a wine fridge. There’s a convenient powder on this level as well. Barely below grade, the lower-level houses the two spacious bedrooms with stone tile floors. The front bedroom has two large transom windows, a ceiling fan and a custom, full walk-in closet. The second bedroom is currently set up as an office with a large egress window and a closet. The two bedrooms share a sleek, modern bathroom with walk-in shower and floating vanity. The hallway provides access to a laundry room with utility sink and full size, front loading washer and dryer. With a Walkscore of 97, this location simply can’t be beat with Rittenhouse Square and Center City at your fingertips!
Unit can be rented furnished for $3600/month

title: FULLY-FURNISHED rental in the city with 2 CAR PARKING!
description:
Where else can you find a FULLY-FURNISHED rental in the city with 2 CAR PARKING? Right here!!! This two-story gem in the heart of Northern Liberties is filled with character but has a lot of modern updates. Upon entering, you'll immediately notice the freshly painted interior, spacious and open floor plan, recessed lighting and original hardwood flooring throughout the ground floor. Off of the spacious living room, which has a large coat closet by the front door, there is a dining area filled with natural light from the large windows and a cute half-bathroom. The large updated kitchen in the rear of the home features a stainless steel refrigerator, 4-burner gas stove and oven, microwave, dishwasher and plenty of storage space as well as access to the private outdoor patio with its own seating and a grill. Up the stairs to the second floor are 3 bedrooms and 1 brand new, recently renovated full bathroom. The oversized primary bedroom gets a ton of natural light from four large windows and fits a king-size bed as well as two huge closets. The second bedroom comfortably fits a queen bed and also has great closet storage. The updated bathroom is fully equipped with a dual vanity sink, soaking tub and shower duo, and abstract tile flooring. With laundry and ample storage space inside, you also won't want to miss out on the rare 2 car parking in the front of the home! This prime location is just a short walk to Girard Ave, Revitalization project, the Piazza, and all the restaurants, coffee shops, hair/nail salons, medical/dental offices and grocery stores NoLibs has to offer; you get it all on this vibrant yet quiet & peaceful block off of George St. Just a short walk/drive to Fishtown and the riverfront venues as well as easy access to I-95. This rare opportunity will not last!
1022 N 4th St

Welcome to 411 Dupont. A rare SINGLE DETACHED house in an incredible location, a mere half a mile straight shot to Manayunk's incredible Main Street.  With 4 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bathrooms, a huge Garage, your own private outdoor Patio space and an enormous Open Concept Main Floor, 411 Dupont delivers a level of space that is almost impossible to find, in this amazing location. Park your car in the Garage of your new home and use the interior access door to find yourself on the Lower Level of the house. As you continue down the hall, you will pass several areas perfect for storage, your Laundry area, complete with Washer and Dryer and the home's 4th Bedroom, delivering brand new modern flooring and it's own 2 piece, recently updated Bathroom. Head up the stairs to pass the home's Front Door and then find yourself in the heart of the house, the enormous, open Main Floor, boasting modern flooring and space upon space. On the street side of the house is a massive Family / TV Room, complete with a ceiling fan and streaming natural light. In the middle of the Main Floor is the Kitchen, featuring brand new countertops and an abundance of cabinet space. Finishing off the Main Floor is the Bonus Room, boasting an incredible Bar and access to the large, private, 2 tiered outside Patio. Heading upstairs, you will find wall to wall brand new carpeting, inside the Primary Bedroom and the 2 other bedrooms. All 3 upstairs bedrooms have ceiling fans and large closets. The Primary Suite includes your new Primary Bathroom, complete with a brand-new vanity. The Hall Bathroom is also a Full Bathroom and also has a brand-new vanity, as well as a brand new medicine cabinet and light fixture. title: Welcome to el Magnet at 1141 N Front Street!
description:
Welcome to el Magnet at 1141 N Front Street! This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes. It features great amenities including a shared common roof deck with center city views, a bike room, elevator, and parking. The apartment features vinyl flooring throughout the unit with large windows for natural lighting. The kitchen is complemented with a quartz countertop and a beautiful backsplash that blends in perfectly with the white cabinets and makes the kitchen look very modern and clean. There is plenty of cabinet space and all the appliances you can ask for inside a unit including a microwave and an in-unit washer and dryer. With an awareness of the vibrant, surrounding neighborhood, the builder took great care to provide high-quality sound reducing windows and walls to provide a relaxing home environment. The building offers limited parking spots at an additional cost. About Fishtown and Northern Liberties: Located in the heart of Fishtown, just a half block off of Girard Ave and two blocks from Frankford Ave. 1141 N Front is walking distance of the best dining and entertainment around: The Fillmore, Fette Sau, Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda's, Mulherin's, Sugarhouse, the Piazza at Schmidt's, and much more. Steps to public transit options - the Market-Frankford Line, the Girard trolley, and SEPTA buses as well as quick access to I-95 and Columbus Ave.

title: Affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!
description:
Location Location Location! Available 08/1/2023. 20th & Walnut - only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square, bars, restaurants, shops, historic places & more! This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. In recent decades, Eberhardt's Antiques operated out of the first floor. Now it is your chance to rent this amazing, affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square! When you walk into the building, you will be amazed by the preserved historic details and gorgeous mirrors throughout the hallway. The building has a big shared rooftop with sublime views of the city! The apartment is located on the basement level of the building and has a small outdoor space! The details of the building will make every day walking in that hallway feel like a special occasion! The apartment can fit easily all of your furniture and you can comfortably host all of your friends and family. The bedroom has a spacious closet with an organizer, and space for a full/queen bed, desk, dresser, and more. It has stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, central AC & Heating, a beautiful bathroom, and an in-unit washer & dryer! The only con is that there is not much natural light. It will be professionally cleaned before the new tenant's move-in date. Water is included in the rent. Pets are ok with a pet deposit and under 50 pounds. Inquire about the video tour! First, and last & security to move in. 700+ credit score & 3x the rent income required to move in. No Airbnb arbitrage. Inquire about other units that we have available in this beautiful building!
2010 Walnut St #B01

title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.
735 Spruce St #4F
